action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A freshly baked pizza with melted cheese, tomato sauce, and green basil leaves, placed on a round metal tray on a wooden table. The pizza has a golden-brown crust with some charred spots. In the background, there is another pizza on a plate and a dark bottle.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A large, round pizza with a golden-brown crust is placed on a white plate. The pizza is topped with melted cheese, diced tomatoes, and green herbs. In the background, there is a small plate with a slice of pizza, a napkin, and a salt shaker. The setting appears to be a dining table.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A freshly baked pizza with melted cheese, tomato sauce, and green basil leaves, placed on a round metal tray on a wooden table. The pizza has a golden-brown crust with some charred spots. In the background, there is another pizza on a plate and a dark bottle.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there a visible slice of pizza on a small plate in the background of your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A large, round pizza with a golden-brown crust is placed on a white plate. The pizza is topped with melted cheese, diced tomatoes, and green herbs. In the background, there is a small plate with a slice of pizza, a napkin, and a salt shaker. The setting appears to be a dining table.
QUESTION: Is there a visible slice of pizza on a small plate in the background of your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there a dark bottle visible in the background of your image?

ANSWER: Yes

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
